46 class Reaction
47 {
48 public:
49 
53  Reaction(
54  const Mutation::Utilities::IO::XmlElement& node,
55  const Mutation::Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics& thermo);
56 
60  Reaction(const Reaction& reaction)
61  : m_formula(reaction.m_formula),
62  m_reactants(reaction.m_reactants),
63  m_products(reaction.m_products),
64  m_reversible(reaction.m_reversible),
65  m_thirdbody(reaction.m_thirdbody),
66  m_conserves(reaction.m_conserves),
67  m_thirdbodies(reaction.m_thirdbodies),
68  m_type(reaction.m_type),
69  mp_rate(reaction.mp_rate ? reaction.mp_rate->clone() : NULL)
70  { }
71 
75  Reaction& operator = (Reaction reaction) {
76  swap(*this, reaction);
77  return *this;
78  }
79 
84  bool operator == (const Reaction& r);
85 
89  bool operator != (const Reaction& r) {
90  return !((*this) == r);
91  }
92 
96  ~Reaction() {
97  delete mp_rate;
98  mp_rate = NULL;
99  }
100 
104  const std::string& formula() const {
105  return m_formula;
106  }
107 
112  int order() const {
113  return m_reactants.size() + (m_thirdbody ? 1 : 0);
114  }
115 
119  int nReactants() const {
120  return m_reactants.size();
121  }
122 
126  int nProducts() const {
127  return m_products.size();
128  }
129 
133  bool isReversible() const {
134  return m_reversible;
135  }
136 
140  bool isThirdbody() const {
141  return m_thirdbody;
142  }
143 
147  bool conservesChargeAndMass() const {
148  return m_conserves;
149  }
150 
155  ReactionType type() const {
156  return m_type;
157  }
158 
162  const RateLaw* rateLaw() const {
163  return mp_rate;
164  }
165 
169  int reactant(int species) const {
170  return std::accumulate(m_reactants.begin(), m_reactants.end(), 0,
171  [species](int sum, int index) { return sum + (index == species); }
172  );
173  }
174 
178  const std::vector<int>& reactants() const {
179  return m_reactants;
180  }
181 
185  int product(int species) const {
186  return std::accumulate(m_products.begin(), m_products.end(), 0,
187  [species](int sum, int index) { return sum + (index == species); }
188  );
189  }
190 
194  const std::vector<int>& products() const {
195  return m_products;
196  }
197 
203  const std::vector<std::pair<int, double> >& efficiencies() const {
204  return m_thirdbodies;
205  }
206 
207  friend void swap(Reaction& left, Reaction& right);
208 
209 private:
210 
221  void parseFormula(
222  const Mutation::Utilities::IO::XmlElement& node,
223  const Mutation::Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics& thermo);
224 
230  /*enum ParseState {

232  name,

234  };*/
235 
246  void parseSpecies(
247  std::vector<int>& species, std::string& str,
248  const Mutation::Utilities::IO::XmlElement& node,
249  const Mutation::Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics& thermo);
250 
255  void determineType(const Mutation::Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics& thermo);
256 
257 private:
258 
259  std::string m_formula;

261  std::vector<int> m_products;
262
